title: Electro Mechanical Technician
job_overview:
WE'RE HIRING: Electro Mechanical Technician

 Join our bakery team and keep the machines running smoothly!


 Job Summary:
We’re looking for a skilled Electro Mechanic Technician to maintain, troubleshoot, and repair our bakery equipment. You'll play a vital role in ensuring efficient and uninterrupted production.


 DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES
* Maintain and repair bakery machines like ovens, mixers, proofers, and conveyors
* Troubleshoot mechanical and electrical issues to reduce downtime
*  Inspect equipment and replace faulty components
*  Coordinate with production staff for seamless operations
*  Maintain accurate records of repairs and inventory
*  Follow strict safety protocols during all tasks


 QUALIFICATIONS:
 * High school diploma or GED (technical certification is a plus!)
*  Experience as an Electro-Mechanic Tech, preferably in bakery/food industry
* Strong knowledge of electrical systems and mechanical components
* Familiar with bakery equipment and how it works
* Can read schematics and technical manuals
* Great at problem-solving and working with a team


 Interested Applicants:
     Please send your biodata, resume, or CV to:
 Email: Upgrade to see actual info
     Mobile:Upgrade to see actual infoApply now and grow with us in the world of baking!
